backend/main.mo: Defines the actor backend with access control, user approval, storage mixins, and extensive type models for profiles, games, events, chat, rewards, and AI behavior.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping two avatar-related features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and game modules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router wiring all pages, providers, UI components, and 40+ game routes.
frontend/src/components/AchievementCeleb: Implements a global celebration system showing confetti or fireworks overlays via queued portal-rendered events.
Component gating children behind admin approval with request flow, loading UI, and styled approval prompt.
frontend/src/components/avatar3d/AvatarP: Interactive 3D avatar preview with drag-to-rotate controls and dynamic rendering based on avatar configuration.
frontend/src/components/avatar3d/AvatarR: Empty placeholder file for future 3D avatar rig logic.
frontend/src/components/avatar3d/avatarV: Provides functions that map avatar configuration values to visual variant styles for body, head, hair, pants, headwear, and shoes.
Queued portal-based system showing animated motivational feedback messages with emojis.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with branding, a heart icon, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Provides a game screen layout with score display, navigation, trophy upgrades, and game-over handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the top navigation bar with login controls, navigation links, and optional admin access.
frontend/src/components/HomepageFeatures: Lists interactive feature cards highlighting various app modules and hubs.
frontend/src/components/InstantMiniActiv: Implements age‑based mini‑games with different game loops, scoring, and canvas interactions.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/ArtsMu: Implements multiple arts and music mini-games such as color mixing, drawing, rhythm, instruments, and creative prompts with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Discov: Implements discovery-themed games including facts, how‑it‑works items, world explorer content, and inventions, with step progression and scoring.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Readin: Contains reading and vocabulary games such as phonics, word building, stories, spelling, and vocabulary quizzes with scoring and progress.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Scienc: React component defining multiple science mini-games (weather, space, animals, plants) and managing gameplay state and scoring.
frontend/src/components/MascotGuide.tsx: Shows a page‑aware mascot assistant that gives tips, optional voice guidance, and a toggleable help panel.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component for creating a child profile, validating name and age, and saving via mutateAsync.
frontend/src/content/seasonalEventStorie: Exports a dataset of kid‑safe seasonal event stories with narration scripts and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines shared frontend types and integrates react‑query with the backend actor for user, activity, and project data.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color themes, neon effects, typography, and 3D avatar utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin interface providing user status management, restrictions, and activity viewing with role checks.
frontend/src/pages/ArtGalleryPage.tsx: Artwork upload and gallery browsing page with image validation, preview, and submission logic.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarCreatorPage.tsx: Avatar customization tool that loads user config, allows part selection or randomization, and saves updates.
frontend/src/pages/CertificatesPage.tsx: Generates achievement certificates using canvas and lists user certificates, supporting custom text.
frontend/src/pages/ChatModule.tsx: Simple chat UI with contact list, message history, and message sending for monitored communication.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements a real-time chat UI with online users, polling, message sending, and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/CraftDIYPage.tsx: Displays craft project categories, shows filtered or mock projects, and allows marking projects as completed.
frontend/src/pages/CreativeFunHub.tsx: Shows a hub of creative modules and navigates to interactive entertainment features.
frontend/src/pages/DanceChallengePage.ts: Provides selectable dance routines with timed pose progression and optional camera integration.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays searchable dashboard of app modules with admin-aware visibility and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/EventCardCreator.tsx: Offers a card-design interface with templates, fonts, stickers, and share/download actions.
frontend/src/pages/EventCardsPage.tsx: Provides a UI for creating customizable event cards with templates, colors, and downloadable output.
frontend/src/pages/EventsModule.tsx: Implements an event manager allowing users to create, list, and organize events with dates, types, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Handles event creation, reminders, and notifications with a UI for managing local events and displaying alerts.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackPage.tsx: Displays a feedback submission form supporting multiple feedback types and listing the user's previous submissions.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackSystem.tsx: Provides an alternate feedback form with satisfaction ratings, feedback categories, and optional anonymity.
frontend/src/pages/FunnyFartHub.tsx: Provides a large list of themed fart sounds and UI to play them with controls for shuffle and mute, plus navigation back to the hub.
frontend/src/pages/games/AmbulanceRescue: A timed rescue game where players move an ambulance to save patients, track scores, and handle spawning and movement.
frontend/src/pages/games/BalloonPop.tsx: Implements an animated balloon‑popping game with spawning, movement, scoring, and timed play using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/pages/games/BibbleAdventure: Defines a platformer where the player jumps across platforms, collects coins, and avoids falling to increase score.
frontend/src/pages/games/BirthdayCakeDec: Provides a click‑based cake decorating game where users place emoji decorations and earn points before finishing.
frontend/src/pages/games/BirthdayCakeMak: Implements a multi‑step cake creation game where players choose base, flavor, and layers to build a cake and score points.
frontend/src/pages/games/BossesLearnHabi: Canvas shooter where a boss predicts player movement from recent key inputs and fires attacks accordingly; tracks score, patterns, and projectiles.
frontend/src/pages/games/BossFightOnly.t: Runs a canvas‑based boss fight with movement, attacks, projectiles, and multiple boss phases, tracking score and game over state.
frontend/src/pages/games/CatGrapplingHoo: Physics-based grappling game where a cat swings toward clicked points, collects food, avoids enemies, and accumulates score.
frontend/src/pages/games/CityMovingPlatf: Platformer with rotating moving platforms, gravity, and scoring based on distance traveled; player falls or reaches end to finish runs.
Puzzle-action game where the player indirectly moves toward a goal while the user controls enemies to clear a safe path and advance levels.
frontend/src/pages/games/CronkerKontry.t: Idle/resource management game featuring buildings, upgrades, achievements, and prestige systems generating gold, food, and power over time.
frontend/src/pages/games/DelayedControls: Canvas-based game where player movement is delayed via an input queue while collecting coins and avoiding obstacles.
frontend/src/pages/games/DungeonJanitorS: Top‑down cleaning game where the player moves around clearing debris types for points while new debris periodically spawns.
Shooter‑survival game with enemies, projectiles, energy orbs, adaptive difficulty, and AI hint generation.
frontend/src/pages/games/EnemiesPlatform: Platformer where flying enemies act as moving platforms and the player jumps toward a goal while avoiding collisions.
frontend/src/pages/games/EnemyControlsCa: Game where an enemy's movement controls the camera while the player collects coins and avoids being caught.
frontend/src/pages/games/EscapeRoomUnive: Implements a timed multi-room escape game with item finding, room unlocking, scoring, and inventory management.
frontend/src/pages/games/EverythingBreak: Implements a platformer where platforms break after use, with physics, keyboard controls, and level progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/EverythingIsBut: Creates a canvas game where clicking randomized action buttons affects the player and goal visibility while scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/FamousPlaces.ts: Multiple‑choice quiz game about identifying locations of famous landmarks with scoring and progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/FinalBoss.tsx: Canvas defense game where players place traps to stop waves of heroes attacking a boss, with scoring and wave scaling.
frontend/src/pages/games/FloorIsLiar.tsx: Canvas platformer where platforms may lie about being safe, with level-based scoring and collision logic.
frontend/src/pages/games/ForestNight.tsx: Top‑down movement game where the player collects spawning coins before time runs out while managing visibility.
frontend/src/pages/games/GadgetCombat.ts: Top‑down combat game where the player uses selectable gadgets to affect pursuing enemies and earn score.
frontend/src/pages/games/GlitchWorldEsca: Platformer using glitch mode to invert which platforms are solid while avoiding falls and progressing levels.
frontend/src/pages/games/GrandmaSecretAr: Canvas-based arcade hub with three minigames—whack‑a‑mole, catch, and memory—tracking score and messages.
frontend/src/pages/games/InventoryIsEnem: Canvas-based collection and avoidance game where inventory weight slows the player and affects health. Handles movement, item pickup/drop, enemy behavior, scoring, and game loop rendering.
frontend/src/pages/games/LiesAndTruths.t: Platformer where players navigate platforms based on hints that may be true or false. Includes jumping physics, platform safety logic, hints, scoring, and level progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/MemoryMatch.tsx: Emoji-based memory matching game with increasing grid size per level. Manages card flipping, matching logic, scoring, moves, and automatic level advancement.
Room-based puzzle game where each room has a color, pattern, or sequence puzzle to solve. Tracks solved rooms, score, puzzle input, and ends when all rooms are completed.
frontend/src/pages/games/MonsterMaze.tsx: Grid maze game where the player navigates to an exit while avoiding moving monsters. Handles keyboard movement, monster AI, collision detection, scoring, and win/lose states.
frontend/src/pages/games/MoveWhenBlink.t: Canvas-based game where the player can move only while blinking, dodging moving enemies and reaching a goal to score points.
frontend/src/pages/games/NumberRunner.ts: Lane‑runner math game where obstacles contain problems and the player selects answers to avoid collision and earn points.
frontend/src/pages/games/OneButtonHero.t: One‑button action game where tap, hold, and long‑hold trigger jump, dash, or shield while avoiding obstacles.
frontend/src/pages/games/OneRoomInfinite: Single-room system cycling through dodge, collect, memory, and platformer mini‑games with shared player state and scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/PacMan.tsx: Simplified Pac‑Man clone with grid movement, pellets, ghosts, lives, and a procedurally initialized maze.
frontend/src/pages/games/PauseMechanic.t: Canvas-based game where player collects coins, avoids hazards, and triggers random effects when pausing. Tracks score, high score, movement, hazards, and pause-driven state changes.
frontend/src/pages/games/PoliceBuddyChas: Lane-switching chase game where players catch criminals while avoiding escapes. Includes spawning logic, speed increases, scoring, and game-over detection.
frontend/src/pages/games/PumpkinSmash.ts: Canvas click game with bouncing pumpkins; clicking removes pumpkins and increases score. Includes timer, spawn logic, and continuous animation of pumpkin movement.
frontend/src/pages/games/ReverseProgress: Platformer where abilities decrease each level; player navigates platforms, enemies, and a goal. Manages movement, abilities, cooldowns, and level-based resets.
frontend/src/pages/games/ScreenIsEnemy.t: Collection game where random screen effects hinder the player while collecting coins. Tracks movement, effects like shake or shrink, scoring, and canvas rendering.
frontend/src/pages/games/ShapeShiftingWo: Implements a shape‑shifting exploration game with obstacles, collectible items, level progression, and keyboard‑controlled movement and form changes.
frontend/src/pages/games/SlimeEvolutionA: Runs a canvas‑based survival game where a slime moves, evolves forms, and avoids or interacts with spawned enemies.
frontend/src/pages/games/SoundBasedWorld: Defines a navigation game using sound‑wave visualization, obstacle collisions, and movement‑triggered waves to reach a goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpaceInvaders.t: Implements a Space‑Invaders‑style shooter with player movement, waves of enemies, bullets, and a continuous game loop.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpaceStationLif: Creates a resource‑management simulation where a player role affects events, resources, scoring, and daily progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpeedIsHealth.t: Canvas-based movement game where player speed affects health, with obstacles, coins, and collision logic.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpiderWebPuzzle: Node-connection puzzle where players disconnect linked nodes across levels to free all nodes and win.
frontend/src/pages/games/SuperpowerTrain: Side-scrolling obstacle game where player uses unlockable powers to avoid or interact with obstacles and gain score.
frontend/src/pages/games/SuperSpeedyRace: Lane-based racing game with falling obstacles, collision checks, increasing speed, and score progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/Tetris.tsx: Tetris implementation with piece generation, rotation, drop logic, scoring, and line-clearing mechanics.
frontend/src/pages/games/ThemeParkBuilde: Manages a park-building game with ride placement, income ticks, happiness, visitors, and game-over logic.
frontend/src/pages/games/TicTacToe.tsx: Implements Tic-Tac-Toe with PvP and AI modes, win detection, draw checks, and basic AI decision logic.
frontend/src/pages/games/TimeControlAdve: Runs an action game with time powers, spawning enemies, coins, projectiles, and a frame-based game loop.
frontend/src/pages/games/TimeLoopPizzaDe: Canvas-based delivery game featuring time loops, obstacles, pizza deliveries, and persistent obstacle removal.
frontend/src/pages/games/TinyHeroGiantWo: Side‑scrolling platformer where a tiny hero explores a giant world with physics, collisions, coins, and a moving camera.
frontend/src/pages/games/TutorialIsVilla: Canvas-based game where a misleading tutorial spawns traps and hazards, updating player state, messages, and collisions in a timed loop.
frontend/src/pages/games/WordWizard.tsx: Word-scramble game that tracks time, score, and found words while generating scrambled letters for players to assemble.
frontend/src/pages/games/YoureLateAlways: Action dodging game with chaotic projectiles, fires, and explosions where the player must survive and reach a goal.
frontend/src/pages/GamesHub.tsx: Displays a catalog of mini‑games with icons, categories, and difficulty options, allowing navigation into specific game modules.
frontend/src/pages/GamesModule.tsx: Shows a tabbed interface of games by type with progress, scores, and selection handling for an individual game.
frontend/src/pages/GreenScreenFunPage.ts: Lets users upload or capture a photo, place it into cartoon scenes via canvas, and download the composited green‑screen image.
frontend/src/pages/InteractiveShortsPage: Implements interactive branching stories with scenes, choices, endings, and UI for selecting and navigating stories.
frontend/src/pages/JokesGenerator.tsx: React page that displays preset jokes, supports category filtering, random joke generation, favoriting, sharing, and audio playback.
frontend/src/pages/JokesPage.tsx: Jokes management page with API-backed browsing, submitting, rating, favoriting, and random selection of jokes.
frontend/src/pages/KaraokeModePage.tsx: Karaoke interface letting users select kid songs, play/pause lyrics progression, and adjust vocal/music volumes.
frontend/src/pages/LearnHubPage.tsx: Learning hub defining multiple educational categories and lessons, each with metadata and activity components.
frontend/src/pages/MusicRemixPage.tsx: Music remix builder allowing users to layer audio loops, control playback, visualize audio, and submit remixes.
frontend/src/pages/ParentalControl.tsx: Provides parental control settings including screen time, content filters, feature toggles, and admin user approvals.
Allows users to edit and save profile details such as name, age, avatar, and theme with backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsAchievements.t: Displays static achievements, badges, points, and progress in a rewards dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Shows dynamic reward data, badges earned, and game-related progress using backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/ScaryHub.tsx: Renders a themed hub of spooky mini‑games with sound toggles and animated surprise effects.
frontend/src/pages/SeasonalEventsPage.ts: Displays seasonal event themes, activities, decorations, and stories with interactive actions and completion tracking.
frontend/src/pages/SmartHubPage.tsx: Shows a hub of categorized activities with navigation, difficulty filters, and user state integration.
frontend/src/pages/SpinWheelPage.tsx: Implements a spin‑the‑wheel reward system with cooldowns, animations, and reward history fetching.
frontend/src/pages/StickerCreatorPage.ts: Provides a drawing canvas for creating custom stickers and submitting them to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/StoryBuilderPage.tsx: Allows users to build multi‑scene stories with characters, props, text, and save them to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGenerator.tsx: Interactive UI for creating simple 2D videos using templates, characters, and stickers with preview and export buttons.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGeneratorPage.ts: Generates animated story-based videos by creating canvas-drawn frames with character motion and text.
frontend/src/pages/VideoHubPage.tsx: Displays categorized kids' YouTube channels with details and modal previews, organized by age groups.
frontend/src/pages/VirtualPetHubPage.tsx: Manages a virtual pet with naming, accessories, decorations, home styles, and persistence via user identity and backend hooks.
frontend/src/utils/avatarConfig.ts: Provides default avatar settings and merges user avatar configuration with defaults.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, and enabling plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing avatar creator enhancement features, versions, and pending requests.
